headline: GTA Online Update
subtitle: Introducing the new Pegassi Zentorno
content:
Make sure the 99% know you're in a vehicle they can't afford with this loud, brash supercar from Pegassi. Insanely fast with a high-tech interior, this is as close as you can get to a fighter jet on wheels. Perfect for the insecure poseur in everybody.

Be the envy of all your Adder-driving friends and purchase the new Zentorno now on legendarymotorsport.net – also featured in the new High Life race ‘Loss Leader’.
